00386 inline PandoraMonitoring::PandoraMonitoring() :
00387     m_transparencyThresholdE(-1.f),
00388     m_energyScaleThresholdE(-1.f)
00389 {
00390     int argc = 0;
00391     char* argv = (char *)"";
00392 
00393     m_pApplication = new TApplication("PandoraMonitoring", &argc, &argv);
00394     m_pApplication->SetReturnFromRun(kTRUE);
00395 }

00470 #define GET_ROOT_COLOR(a, b)                                                \
00471     case a : return b;
00472 
00476 #define GET_PARTICLE_COLOR_SWITCH(a, b, c)                                  \
00477     case a : return c;
00478 
00482 #define GET_PDG_COLOR_SWITCH(a, b, c)                                       \
00483     case b : return c;

00487 
00488 inline EColor PandoraMonitoring::GetROOTColor(Color color)
00489 {
00490     switch (color)
00491     {
00492         COLOR_TABLE(GET_ROOT_COLOR)
00493         default : return kGray;
00494     }
00495 }
00496 
00497 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00498 
00499 inline Color PandoraMonitoring::GetColorForPdgCode(int particleId)
00500 {
00501     switch (particleId)
00502     {
00503         PARTICLE_DATA_COLOR_TABLE(GET_PDG_COLOR_SWITCH)
00504         default : return GRAY;
00505     }
00506 }
